item.description:
For this photoshoot, we will poor a lot of sand on the studio floor, will use the natural light from big windows, and will use strobe light technique to blast off the white background and create the beach scene. This would be a good learning practice of how to create a beach scene in photo studio.
Currently we have three models and one MUA signed up for this photoshoot.
The estimated of some of the cost for this photoshoot are:
Bikini outfits 150.00, MUA 150.00, 3 models 300.00, sand+misc 100.00 = 700.00

Timetable:
Setup beach scene and lighting 1:00 - 3:00 (we need some of you to help to do this)
MUA and models 2:00 - 3:00
Photoshoot 3:00 - 6:00
Cleanup 6:00 - 7:00 (we need your help on this as well)
All photographers, models, and makeup artists from this group are welcome and invited to attend.
item.name: Bikini on sandy beach !!!
